name: Industrial Sector 0x7F: Parkour
description:
Playground for a simple first person parkour system. You can run around three rooftops and some interiors.

Controls

Basic controls are:

Button/ControlDescription MouseLook around Right mouse buttonZoom WASDMove around [Space]Jump [CTRL]Crouch [Shift]Run [CTRL]+[Z]Save your position [Z]Load your position [ALT]+[Z]Reload level

There are also additional things you can do:

  • To perform a wallrun, jump into a wall while not letting go of [Space].
  • To perform a walljump, jump while in the air and there is a wall behind your back. You cannot walljump if you are falling at great speeds.
  • To perform a pullup, hold [Space], face the edge, and look about 20° above or below the horizon. Your head has to be above the edge you want to pull up to.
  • To perform a vault, do the same as pullup, only look within 20° of the horizon. Your head has to be above the edge you want to vault over.
  • To perform a landing, press [CTRL] slightly before or after hitting the ground. This will reduce fall damage.
  • To perform a landing roll, first preform a landing, and then press [Space]. This will greatly reduce fall damage.
  • To perform a regular roll, crouch, look in the direction you want to roll and press [Space]. If you hold any of the movement keys, you will roll in the direction of movement instead of where you are looking.
  • To perform a jump off an edge, that is, to decelerate and fall straight down, hold [CTRL]. You can control the amount of deceleration by varying the duration for which you hold [CTRL].
Closing thoughts

The game has its' problems. The in-game menu is not fully functional, so you cannot adjust volume from in-game. Movement is still rough around the edges, literally. Step-up code could use some improvement, sloped surfaces slow you down (which they should not), and moves sometimes do not work as expected. Overall, good enough for a demo, I think. Hopefully I will update everything in due time.
